    • Constructor Detail

      • Board

        public Board()
        The constructor It starts the whole game. This method locates an apple, starts an timer and add key listeners.

    • Method Detail

      • paint

        public void paint​(java.awt.Graphics g)
        This method paints the GUI of the programme.

        It draw title and game containers, set up the graphics which are needed during the game and set up snake position. This method is handled until the param gameover is false.

        Overrides:
        paint in class javax.swing.JComponent
        Parameters:
        g - uses the Graphics class, which is the abstract base class for all graphics contexts that allow an application to draw onto components.

        locateApple method This method locate an apple on the board.

        move method This method move the tail of the snake using road of the head.

      • gameOver

        private void gameOver​(java.awt.Graphics g)
        gameOver method This method draw 'Game over' information and shows the current score.
        Parameters:
        g - uses the Graphics class, which is the abstract base class for all graphics contexts that allow an application to draw onto components.

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed​(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
        Override method of ActionListener interface. It is repainting the board as long as the game is not over.

      • keyPressed

        public void keyPressed​(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
        Override method of KeyListener interface. It is changing the direction where snake is moving. It restarts the game when player press the space button.
        Specified by:
        keyPressed in interface java.awt.event.KeyListener
